message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price just for you, Bob. I think you'll really love it!
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me.  I'm interested, but I'd be willing to pay closer to $60 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $120, and that's as low as I can go.
Alice, $120 is still a bit high for my budget.  How about we split the difference from our last offers? Would you be willing to do $90?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, $90 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle of our last two offers, so I'll counter with $105.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. It seems like we are getting closer.  I could go up to $80, but that's really my limit.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but $80 is still below my minimum price. I'll try to meet you in the middle one more time. I'll counter with $100.
